alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:23PM EDT until July 18 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SWITZERLAND...CARROLL AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 1123 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madison, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Vevay, Warsaw, Kentucky Speedway, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Worthville, Prestonville, Ethridge, Braytown, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 52, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 40, Interstate 71 at State Route 227, Langstaff, Locust, Moorefield, English, Eagle Station and Easterday. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
